quiz.question: _____ recess
quiz.explanation: 课间休息; 休会, 午餐休息. Children play outside during lunch recess. 孩子们在午餐休息期间在外面玩耍。

quiz.question: excess _______
quiz.explanation: 过度; 超额, 超重行李. Airlines charge fees for excess baggage. 航空公司对超重行李收费。

quiz.question: confess _____
quiz.explanation: 承认; 坦白, 承认罪行. The suspect refused to confess guilt to the crime. 嫌疑人拒绝承认罪行。

quiz.question: ________ largess
quiz.explanation: 慷慨赠予; 施舍, 慷慨赠予. The billionaire's generous largess funded the new library. 亿万富翁的慷慨赠予资助了新图书馆。

quiz.question: guileless _____
quiz.explanation: 天真的; 坦率的, 天真的孩子. The guileless child answered every question honestly. 天真的孩子诚实地回答每个问题。

quiz.question: spineless ______
quiz.explanation: 没有骨气的; 软弱的, 软弱的懦夫. The spineless coward refused to stand up for his beliefs. 软弱的懦夫拒绝为自己的信念挺身而出。

quiz.question: feckless __________
quiz.explanation: 无能的; 软弱的, 无能的领导. The company suffered under feckless leadership. 公司在无能的领导下遭受损失。

quiz.question: peerless ______
quiz.explanation: 无与伦比的; 卓越的, 无与伦比的美丽. She possessed peerless beauty that captivated everyone. 她拥有无与伦比的美丽,迷住了所有人。

quiz.question: shiftless _____
quiz.explanation: 懒散的; 无进取心的, 懒散的懒汉. The shiftless idler refused to find work. 懒散的懒汉拒绝找工作。

quiz.question: relentless _______
quiz.explanation: 无情的; 不懈的, 不懈的追求. The detective showed relentless pursuit of the truth. 侦探对真相进行了不懈的追求。

quiz.question: bootless ______
quiz.explanation: 无益的; 徒劳的, 徒劳的努力. Their bootless effort yielded no results. 他们徒劳的努力没有产生任何结果。

quiz.question: artless _____
quiz.explanation: 天真的; 自然的, 天然的魅力. Her artless charm made her very likable. 她天然的魅力使她非常讨人喜欢。

quiz.question: restless _____
quiz.explanation: 不安的; 焦躁的, 不安的夜晚. He spent a restless night worrying about the exam. 他度过了一个不安的夜晚,为考试担心。

quiz.question: listless _____
quiz.explanation: 无精打采的; 倦怠的, 无精打采的人群. The listless crowd showed little enthusiasm. 无精打采的人群几乎没有热情。

quiz.question: gutless ______
quiz.explanation: 胆小的; 懦弱的, 胆小的懦夫. The gutless coward fled at the first sign of danger. 胆小的懦夫一看到危险就逃跑了。

quiz.question: ____________ heavy-handedness
quiz.explanation: 笨拙; 粗暴, 官僚主义的粗暴. The bureaucratic heavy-handedness frustrated citizens. 官僚主义的粗暴让市民感到沮丧。

quiz.question: ____ positiveness
quiz.explanation: 肯定; 确信, 坚定的肯定. She spoke with firm positiveness about her decision. 她对自己的决定表现出坚定的肯定。

quiz.question: _______ assertiveness
quiz.explanation: 自信; 果断, 健康的自信. Healthy assertiveness helps in professional settings. 健康的自信在职业环境中很有帮助。

quiz.question: _________ restiveness
quiz.explanation: 不安; 焦躁, 政治动荡. Political restiveness grew among the populace. 民众中的政治动荡加剧了。

quiz.question: oafishness ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 粗鲁; 笨拙, 粗鲁和虚张声势. His oafishness and bluster alienated colleagues. 他的粗鲁和虚张声势疏远了同事。

quiz.question: _____ stinginess
quiz.explanation: 吝啬; 小气, 彻底的吝啬. His sheer stinginess prevented him from helping others. 他彻底的吝啬阻止了他帮助别人。

quiz.question: pithiness __ _____
quiz.explanation: 简洁; 精炼, 风格的简洁. The pithiness of style made the essay effective. 风格的简洁使文章很有效。

quiz.question: tackiness __ ____
quiz.explanation: 粘性; 俗气, 胶水的粘性. Test the tackiness of glue before applying. 在使用前测试胶水的粘性。

quiz.question: leisureliness ____
quiz.explanation: 悠闲; 从容, 悠闲的步调. They walked at a leisureliness pace through the park. 他们以悠闲的步调穿过公园。

quiz.question: _________ shiftiness
quiz.explanation: 狡猾; 诡诈, 政治上的狡猾. Voters distrusted the candidate's political shiftiness. 选民不信任候选人政治上的狡猾。

quiz.question: testiness __ _____
quiz.explanation: 易怒; 暴躁, 声音中的易怒. The testiness in voice revealed his frustration. 声音中的易怒显示了他的沮丧。

quiz.question: _____ harness
quiz.explanation: 马具; 利用, 马具. The farmer adjusted the horse harness before plowing. 农民在犁地前调整了马具。

quiz.question: ____ ruthlessness
quiz.explanation: 无情; 冷酷, 冷酷无情. His cold ruthlessness in business was well known. 他在商业上的冷酷无情是众所周知的。

quiz.question: judiciousness ___ _________
quiz.explanation: 明智; 审慎, 明智和克制. The judge showed judiciousness and restraint in sentencing. 法官在量刑时表现出明智和克制。

quiz.question: gregariousness _____
quiz.explanation: 合群; 社交性, 合群特质. Her gregariousness trait made her popular at parties. 她的合群特质使她在聚会上很受欢迎。

quiz.question: unscrupulousness __ ________
quiz.explanation: 不择手段; 无道德原则, 商业上的不择手段. His unscrupulousness in business led to lawsuits. 他商业上的不择手段导致了诉讼。

quiz.question: ________ fastness
quiz.explanation: 要塞; 堡垒, 山地要塞. Rebels retreated to their mountain fastness. 叛军撤退到他们的山地要塞。

quiz.question: ____ redress
quiz.explanation: 纠正; 补救, 寻求补救. Victims have the right to seek redress in court. 受害者有权在法庭上寻求补救。

quiz.question: _________ egress
quiz.explanation: 出口; 外出, 紧急出口. All buildings must have an emergency egress route. 所有建筑物必须有紧急出口路线。

quiz.question: ________ regress
quiz.explanation: 退步; 倒退, 经济倒退. The country experienced economic regress during the crisis. 该国在危机期间经历了经济倒退。

quiz.question: digress ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 离题; 偏离, 离题. The speaker would often digress from topic unnecessarily. 演讲者经常不必要地离题。

quiz.question: _____ __ ingress
quiz.explanation: 进入; 入口, 进入点. Security monitored every point of ingress to the building. 保安监控着建筑物的每个进入点。

quiz.question: transgress ___
quiz.explanation: 违反; 越界, 违反法律. Those who transgress law will face consequences. 违反法律的人将面临后果。

quiz.question: ____ press
quiz.explanation: 新闻界; 压, 自由新闻界. A free press is essential to democracy. 自由新闻界对民主至关重要。

quiz.question: oppress __________
quiz.explanation: 压迫; 欺压, 压迫少数群体. Dictators often oppress minorities in their countries. 独裁者经常压迫本国的少数群体。

quiz.question: _________ distress
quiz.explanation: 痛苦; 困境, 财务困境. The company faced severe financial distress. 公司面临严重的财务困境。

quiz.question: _____ buttress
quiz.explanation: 扶壁; 支撑, 石扶壁. The cathedral's stone buttress supported the walls. 大教堂的石扶壁支撑着墙壁。

quiz.question: _____ duress
quiz.explanation: 胁迫; 强制, 在胁迫下. He signed the contract under duress. 他在胁迫下签署了合同。

quiz.question: assess ____
quiz.explanation: 评估; 估价, 评估风险. Investors must carefully assess risk before investing. 投资者在投资前必须仔细评估风险。

quiz.question: ____ bliss
quiz.explanation: 极乐; 幸福, 纯粹的幸福. The vacation was pure bliss from start to finish. 从头到尾,这个假期都是纯粹的幸福。

quiz.question: remiss __ ____
quiz.explanation: 疏忽的; 玩忽职守的, 玩忽职守. The guard was remiss in duty during the break-in. 警卫在入室盗窃期间玩忽职守。

quiz.question: emboss _ ____
quiz.explanation: 压印; 使凸出, 压印标志. The company will emboss a logo on the leather goods. 公司将在皮革制品上压印标志。

quiz.question: gloss ____
quiz.explanation: 光泽; 掩饰, 掩饰. Don't gloss over the serious problems in the report. 不要掩饰报告中的严重问题。

quiz.question: double-cross _ _______
quiz.explanation: 出卖; 欺骗, 出卖伙伴. The thief planned to double-cross a partner and keep all the money. 小偷计划出卖伙伴并独吞所有钱。

quiz.question: __________ dross
quiz.explanation: 渣滓; 废物, 工业废渣. The factory disposed of industrial dross properly. 工厂妥善处理了工业废渣。

quiz.question: gross ______
quiz.explanation: 总的; 毛的, 毛利率. The company's gross margin improved this quarter. 公司本季度的毛利率有所提高。

quiz.question: toss _ ____
quiz.explanation: 投掷; 抛, 抛硬币. They decided to toss a coin to make the decision. 他们决定抛硬币来做决定。

quiz.question: ____ truss
quiz.explanation: 桁架; 捆扎, 屋顶桁架. The engineer designed a strong roof truss for the building. 工程师为建筑物设计了坚固的屋顶桁架。

quiz.question: _______ artifacts
quiz.explanation: 人工制品; 文物, 古代文物. Archaeologists discovered ancient artifacts at the excavation site. 考古学家在挖掘现场发现了古代文物。

quiz.question: ______ lineaments
quiz.explanation: 面容; 轮廓, 面部轮廓. The artist captured her delicate facial lineaments. 艺术家捕捉到了她精致的面部轮廓。

quiz.question: oddments ______
quiz.explanation: 零碎物品, 零碎物品抽屉. She kept buttons and thread in the oddments drawer. 她把纽扣和线存放在零碎物品抽屉里。

quiz.question: _____ muniments
quiz.explanation: 契据; 证书, 产权契据. The lawyer examined the property's title muniments. 律师检查了该房产的产权契据。

quiz.question: ____ outskirts
quiz.explanation: 郊区; 边缘, 城市郊区. They built a new factory on the city outskirts. 他们在城市郊区建了一座新工厂。

quiz.question: ______ syllabus
quiz.explanation: 教学大纲, 课程大纲. The professor distributed the course syllabus on the first day. 教授在第一天分发了课程大纲。

quiz.question: _______ rebus
quiz.explanation: 画谜, 图画字谜. Children enjoy solving a picture rebus puzzle. 孩子们喜欢解图画字谜。

quiz.question: ________ incubus
quiz.explanation: 梦魇; 负担, 睡梦中的梦魇. Medieval folklore told of a sleeping incubus visiting dreamers. 中世纪民间传说讲述了睡梦中的梦魇造访做梦者。

quiz.question: locus __ _______
quiz.explanation: 地点; 位置, 控制点. Psychologists study one's locus of control. 心理学家研究一个人的控制点。

quiz.question: _____ caucus
quiz.explanation: 党团会议, 政党党团会议. Members gathered for the party caucus before the vote. 成员们在投票前聚集参加政党党团会议。

quiz.question: ____ exodus
quiz.explanation: 大批离去; 出埃及记, 大批离去. The economic crisis triggered a mass exodus from the country. 经济危机引发了大批人离开该国。

quiz.question: ______ nucleus
quiz.explanation: 核; 核心, 原子核. The atomic nucleus contains protons and neutrons. 原子核包含质子和中子。

quiz.question: esophagus ______
quiz.explanation: 食道, 食道癌. Smoking increases the risk of esophagus cancer. 吸烟增加患食道癌的风险。

quiz.question: _____ asparagus
quiz.explanation: 芦笋, 新鲜芦笋. The restaurant served fresh asparagus with hollandaise sauce. 餐厅供应配荷兰酱的新鲜芦笋。

quiz.question: bogus _____
quiz.explanation: 假的; 伪造的, 虚假声明. The insurance company rejected the bogus claim. 保险公司拒绝了虚假声明。

quiz.question: radius ____
quiz.explanation: 半径; 桡骨, 桡骨. The x-ray showed a fracture in the radius bone. X光显示桡骨骨折。

quiz.question: ______ surplus
quiz.explanation: 盈余; 过剩, 预算盈余. The government reported a budget surplus this year. 政府报告今年预算盈余。

quiz.question: ________ stimulus
quiz.explanation: 刺激; 激励, 经济刺激. The government introduced an economic stimulus package. 政府推出了经济刺激计划。

quiz.question: cumulus ______
quiz.explanation: 积云, 积云. Fluffy cumulus clouds drifted across the blue sky. 蓬松的积云飘过蓝天。

quiz.question: stylus ___
quiz.explanation: 触笔; 唱针, 触笔. She used a stylus pen to write on the tablet. 她用触笔在平板电脑上书写。

quiz.question: hippopotamus ____
quiz.explanation: 河马, 河马幼崽. The zoo welcomed a newborn hippopotamus calf. 动物园迎来了一只新生的河马幼崽。

quiz.question: ______ isthmus
quiz.explanation: 地峡, 巴拿马地峡. The Panama isthmus connects North and South America. 巴拿马地峡连接北美和南美。

quiz.question: _________ animus
quiz.explanation: 敌意; 憎恶, 政治敌意. Political animus divided the legislative body. 政治敌意分裂了立法机构。

quiz.question: _____ genus
quiz.explanation: 属; 类, 植物属. The botanist identified the plant genus correctly. 植物学家正确识别了植物属。

quiz.question: ____ terminus
quiz.explanation: 终点站, 铁路终点站. The train arrived at the rail terminus on time. 火车准时到达铁路终点站。

quiz.question: ____ ___ onus
quiz.explanation: 责任; 义务, 承担责任. Leaders must bear the onus of difficult decisions. 领导者必须承担艰难决定的责任。

quiz.question: viscous _____
quiz.explanation: 粘稠的, 粘稠的液体. Honey is a viscous fluid that flows slowly. 蜂蜜是一种缓慢流动的粘稠液体。

quiz.question: tremendous ______
quiz.explanation: 巨大的; 惊人的, 巨大的影响. The new policy had a tremendous impact on the economy. 新政策对经济产生了巨大的影响。

quiz.question: horrendous _____
quiz.explanation: 可怕的; 骇人的, 可怕的罪行. The community was shocked by the horrendous crime. 社区对这起可怕的罪行感到震惊。

quiz.question: hazardous _____
quiz.explanation: 危险的; 有害的, 危险废物. The factory properly disposed of hazardous waste. 工厂妥善处理了危险废物。

quiz.question: herbaceous _____
quiz.explanation: 草本的, 草本植物. The garden featured many herbaceous plant species. 花园有许多草本植物种类。

quiz.question: curvaceous ____
quiz.explanation: 曲线美的; 丰满的, 曲线美的身材. The actress was known for her curvaceous body. 这位女演员以其曲线美的身材而闻名。

quiz.question: gorgeous ____
quiz.explanation: 华丽的; 绚丽的, 华丽的礼服. She wore a gorgeous gown to the awards ceremony. 她穿着华丽的礼服参加颁奖典礼。

quiz.question: extemporaneous ______
quiz.explanation: 即兴的; 无准备的, 即兴演讲. The politician delivered an extemporaneous speech without notes. 政治家没有讲稿发表了即兴演讲。

quiz.question: extraneous ______
quiz.explanation: 无关的; 外来的, 无关事项. Please remove all extraneous matter from the document. 请从文件中删除所有无关事项。

quiz.question: simultaneous ___________
quiz.explanation: 同时的; 同步的, 同声传译. The conference provided simultaneous translation in five languages. 会议提供五种语言的同声传译。

quiz.question: ______ instantaneous
quiz.explanation: 瞬间的; 即刻的, 几乎是瞬间的. The computer's response was almost instantaneous. 计算机的响应几乎是瞬间的。

quiz.question: spontaneous ________
quiz.explanation: 自发的; 自然的, 自发的掌声. The audience broke into spontaneous applause. 观众爆发出自发的掌声。

quiz.question: homogeneous _____
quiz.explanation: 同质的; 均匀的, 同质群体. The study examined a homogeneous group of participants. 研究检查了一个同质群体的参与者。

quiz.question: heterogeneous _______
quiz.explanation: 异质的; 混杂的, 异质混合物. Sand and water form a heterogeneous mixture. 沙子和水形成异质混合物。

quiz.question: igneous ____
quiz.explanation: 火成的, 火成岩. Granite is a common type of igneous rock. 花岗岩是一种常见的火成岩。

quiz.question: ligneous ______
quiz.explanation: 木质的, 木质组织. The plant's stem contains ligneous tissue for support. 植物的茎含有支撑用的木质组织。

quiz.question: vitreous _____
quiz.explanation: 玻璃状的, 玻璃体. The vitreous humor fills the eyeball. 玻璃体充满眼球。

quiz.question: gaseous _____
quiz.explanation: 气态的, 气态. Water vapor exists in a gaseous state. 水蒸气以气态存在。

quiz.question: osseous ______
quiz.explanation: 骨的; 骨质的, 骨组织. Osseous tissue makes up the skeleton. 骨组织构成骨架。

quiz.question: bounteous _______
quiz.explanation: 慷慨的; 丰富的, 丰收. The farmers celebrated a bounteous harvest this year. 农民们庆祝今年的丰收。

quiz.question: analogous ____
quiz.explanation: 类似的; 相似的, 类似的案例. The lawyer cited an analogous case as precedent. 律师引用了一个类似的案例作为先例。
